model.name: Tee Shirt Watercolor Monogram
model.disambiguatingDescription: This piece revisits the capsule's defining Watercolor Monogram motif on a graphic T-shirt. The pattern is reproduced in light blue as a jacquard weave, on a regular-fitting piece crafted from cotton. The signature graphic is placed to embellish the front, back and sleeve. Louis Vuitton is committed to improving global cotton farming practices, with the Better Cotton Initiative (BCI).

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • White
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 33’’ / 85 cm, height 6' 2’’ / 188 cm
  • Made in Italy

model.name: Tee Shirt Watercolor Monogram
model.disambiguatingDescription: This regular-fitting T-shirt showcases the capsule's Multicolor Watercolor Monogram graphic, which is reproduced as a woven jacquard motif on lightweight cotton fabric. The design is placed across the front, back and sleeve. Louis Vuitton is committed to improving global cotton farming practices, with the Better Cotton Initiative (BCI).
